name: Dr. Nutman 2
description:
Dr. Nutman is a potato raised by two peanuts who don't love him, because they feel like he will never achieve something in his life.

Guided by grief and anger, he leaves his home to find new friends who accept him just as he is. The adventure unravels, as he finds a place called Broko Town in a forest...

v0.0.3 contains 15 - 30 minutes gameplay, featuring

  • 1 Battle
  • 1 Mini Game
  • Plenty of dialogue

(Broko Town does not have much to discover yet)

Thank you for playing :)
